actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Merchant Marine.

official_title: A bill to clear certain impediments to the licensing of a vessel for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries of the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to cause a named vessel to be documented as a vessel of the United States entitled to engage in the coastwise trade, the Great Lakes trade, and the fisheries.

titles.title: A bill to clear certain impediments to the licensing of a vessel for employment in the coastwise trade and fisheries of the United States.
